useLocalMacros.name: Use Local Macros
useLocalMacros.hint:
Certain animations are not configurable in Automated Animations Autorecognition Settings.
Enable this to use the local macros instead of the ones in the compendium for these specific animations.
Current Animations that are under this setting include: Equipment Changes

disableHitAnims.name: Disable "On Hit or Miss" Animations
disableHitAnims.hint: While you can remove these animations from AA's Autorecognition Menu, it will likely come back when you update it. Enable this to disable these animations.

randomHitAnims.name: Make "On Hit or Miss" miss animations appear Off-Target
randomHitAnims.hint: Make miss and critical miss animations appear at a random spot near the missed target token.

autoAccept.name: Automatically accept Effects
autoAccept.hint: Automatically accept Effects from macros, such as adding the Rage Effect when you use the Rage action.

smallTokenScale.name: Default Scale for Small Tokens
smallTokenScale.hint: Determines what scale the animations assume Small characters are. If you use the "Scale tokens according to size" Pathfinder 2e system setting, this setting is disabled and assumed to be 0.8.

debug.name: Debug Mode
debug.hint: Enables console logs of what PF2e Animations Macros module is doing.

autorecUpdate.name: Autorecognition Menu Update
autorecUpdate.label: Update Menu
autorecUpdate.hint: Check if there are any updates to be made to your animations?
